description:
After being stabbed by a man with a sword wound, I lost consciousness. When I awoke, I found myself in an unfamiliar forest with Jess sleeping soundly while using my stomach as a pillow. It seems she`s really tired. I decided we should start moving and that Jess should ride on my back but... Cutie-pie Jess, you can`t sit on me like that! As we go on our love comedy journey, Jess reveals a shocking truth to me...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Be Careful How You Ride a Pig
Buta no Norikata ni wa Chuui Shiro
豚の乗り方には注意しろ
